description:
We're so excited to be back up and running. This month we'll be running an event on the theme of "What did I miss?" and have two fantastic talks to relaunch with:

**James Towers - What’s new and upcoming in JS and CSS**

James takes us through how new features are added to the specs, what new ones have been added whilst we were away and what’s still to come over the next couple of years.

**Meghnath Pillay - What's new in React 18**

Exploring React 18 concurrency, performance enhancements and more.

\-\-\-

A huge thank you to our venue sponsor SR2 for hosting us and providing refreshments.

\-\-\-

Please note that due to COVID we are pausing offering food at our meetups. We also know many more people are working from home rather than in town. To allow people to travel in and get some food beforehand we're starting a little later than our pre-pandemic starting time at 7pm. We hope to bring this back soon once we feel we can do this safely.
title: What did I miss? - Bristol JS - June 2022
